column6: BETRAYAL! LIES! This is what happens when the Paradise Group and the Wolverines share more than alliances... And what happens when an old buddy of Wolverine shows up for a boondoggle weekend â€" ENTER FANG! Lady Deathstrike is finally coming to the conclusion that she doesn't have to be alone, but will this moment of vulnerability come back to stab her in the back?
